thread.title: Arsenal vs Bayern Munich: Lucas Perez ruled out of trip after skipping training | Metro News
thread.title_full: Arsenal vs Bayern Munich: Lucas Perez ruled out of trip after skipping training | Metro News

author: Sean Kearns For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Arsenal vs Bayern Munich: Lucas Perez ruled out of trip after skipping training | Metro News
text:
Sean Kearns for Metro.co.uk Tuesday 14 Feb 2017 4:27 pm Lucas Perez is set to miss Arsenal’s clash with Bayern Munich (Picture: Getty) 
Arsenal forward Lucas Perez is expected to miss the club’s Champions League clash with Bayern Munich after missing the club’s training session on Tuesday. 
The Spaniard was absent from the side’s session at their London Colney training base and is not expected to travel with the rest of the group for their last-16 tie at the Allianz Arena. ‘How can Gibbs be captain?!’ Man Utd legend Roy Keane TEARS into Arsenal flops 
Perez has been troubled by an ankle injury in recent weeks and his absence will be a considerable blow to Arsene Wenger, who has considered dropping Mesut Ozil for the first leg. 
The German’s been in poor form in recent weeks and Wenger’s unsure whether he’ll select the former Real Madrid star to start against Carlo Ancelotti’s men. 
Elsewhere, there was one returning face at training as Yaya Sanogo made his long-awaited return after a ‘confidential’ problem had ruled the Frenchman out of selection since the summer.
